name: Brian DRDEK, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Benjamin Martinez, Board Secretary, et. al., Appellees
name_abbreviation: Drdek v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Brian DRDEK, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Benjamin Martinez, Board Secretary, et. al., Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of January, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed. The Application for Appointment of Counsel is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
843 A.2d 1221
Brian DRDEK, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Benjamin Martinez, Board Secretary, et. al., Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 28, 2004.
